Class PrescriptionServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.medicalservice.Appointments.services.impl.PrescriptionServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrescriptionService

    @Service
public class PrescriptionServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrescriptionService
    Implementation of the PrescriptionService interface that provides methods for managing prescription documents.

        Returns:
